13 Brain::Brain()
14 {
15  curr_angle_client_ = nh_.serviceClient<remote_robotics::rotor_angle>("rotor_pos/angle");
16  set_pos_client_ = nh_.serviceClient<remote_robotics::servo_motor_pos>("set_abs_servo_motor");
17 }
18 int Brain::getAngle(int motor_idx)
19 {
20  remote_robotics::rotor_angle srv;
21  srv.request.INDEX = motor_idx;
22  if (curr_angle_client_.exists())
23  ROS_INFO("%s exists",curr_angle_client_.getService().c_str());
24  if (curr_angle_client_.call(srv))
25  {
26  if((bool)srv.response.STATUS)
27  {
28  return srv.response.ANGLE;
29  }
30  else
31  {
32  throw std::string("motor with number %i doesn't exist");
33  }
34  }
35  else
36  {
37  std::string error;
38  error = "Failed to call service " + curr_angle_client_.getService();
39  throw error;
40  //ROS_ERROR("Failed to call service %s.\n",curr_angle_client_.getService().c_str());
41  }
42  return -361;
43 }
44 bool Brain::setPos(int motor_idx, int new_pos)
45 {
46  remote_robotics::servo_motor_pos srv;
47 
48  srv.request.inpMotorIdxSrv = motor_idx;
49  srv.request.inpPosUnit = std::string("DEG");
50  srv.request.inpPosVal = new_pos;
51 
52  if (set_pos_client_.call(srv))
53  {
54  ROS_INFO("\nreturned pos value: %i unit: %s of device: %i\n",
55  (int) srv.response.outPosVal,
56  ((std::string) srv.response.outPosUnit).c_str(),
57  (int) srv.response.outMotorIdxSrv);
58  return true;
59  }
60  else
61  {
62  //std::string error;
63  //error = "Failed to call service " + curr_angle_client_.getService();
64  //throw error;
65  ROS_ERROR("Failed to call service %s.\n",set_pos_client_.getService().c_str());
66  }
67  return false;
68 }
